title: End of self-custodial
description:
I will present an overview of the current situation of how countries around the world are restricting or banning the self-custodial ownership model, which is the foundation of cryptocurrencies.

- What kind of laws, regulations and guidance countries have passed to restrict self-custodial
- What kind of areas are being targeted: ownership of cryptocurrencies, wallets, developers, interfaces
- Who are the driving forces behind oppositing self-custodial
- How to counteract this development
